xdi2.messaging.operations

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.operations.Operation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Operation>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConnectOperation, DelOperation, DoOperation, GetOperation, PushOperation, SendOperation, SetOperation

    public abstract class Operation
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable<Operation>
    An XDI messaging operation, represented as a relation.
    Author:
    markus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
